import React from "react"; import "./Profile.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { auth } from "../firebase"; import { database } from "../Database/Firebase"; import { useState } from "react"; function ProfileEdit() { const [info, setInfo] = useState([]); const[Name,setName]=useState(""); const[Age,setAge]=useState(""); const[Profess,setProfess]=useState(""); const[Phone,setPhone]=useState(""); const user = auth.currentUser; GetInfo(user.email); function GetInfo(usermail) { database .collection("User") .get() .then((querySnapshot) => { querySnapshot.forEach((element) => { var data = element.data(); if (data.email == usermail) { setInfo(data); } }); }); } const UpdateInfo=(e,usermail)=> { database .collection("User") .doc(auth.currentUser.uid) .update({ name: Name, age: Age, email: usermail, phone:Phone, profession:Profess, }) .then((docRef) => { alert("Update Info Successfully Published"); }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error Update Info: ", error); }); } return (
